reviewText: Good information. It was purchased for a friend that is in to arts and crafts and found the book to be quite helpful for creative ideas.

I watched this DVD last night and I really walked away from it knowing alot more than I had before I started watching it . I feel with confidence I can now complete a scrimshawed piece ,that is better quality now . I love the from step one to completion and Linda doesn't leave you hanging anywhere in this DVD . SHe walks you through absolutely everything . She's great ! Excellent DVD !!!
